headline: Southampton FC Women sign England U-23 defender Tara Bourne
summary: Southampton FC Women have signed 20-year-old centre-back Tara Bourne following her departure from Sheffield United. She played 17 times for the Blades last season and has already made well-over 50 senior appearances, having had spells […]

headline: Newcastle United Women sign Championship Golden Glove winner
summary: Newcastle United sign Barclays Women’s Championship Golden Glove winner and Sunderland Player of the Season Claudia Moan. The 25-year-old goalkeeper kept ten clean sheets as Sunderland finished third in a very tight promotion race last […]

headline: Brighton Women sign Netherlands U-23 international Marit Auée
summary: Brighton and Hove Albion have signed 22-year-old defender Marit Auée who leaves FC Twente after two years with the Dutch club. She has played over 50 times for the Netherlands age-groups, including 14 appearances for […]

headline: Ex-Saints winger Lexi Lloyd-Smith signs for Bristol City Women
summary: Bristol City have signed 21-year-old winger Lexi Lloyd-Smith on a two-year deal, following her departure from Southampton. She spent two seasons with the Saints, having begun her career began in Arsenal’s Academy before spells at […]

headline: Maddi Wilde rejoins London City Lionesses on permanent deal
summary: Maddi Wilde returns to London City Lionesses on two-year contract after a loan spell last season from Bristol City. The 20-year-old full-back made a total of 25 appearances in all competitions for London City last […]

headline: Durham sign New Zealand international Hanna Blake
summary: Durham have signed 24-year-old New Zealand international forward Hannah Blake from A-League side Adelaide United. The attacker represented New Zealand at the U-20 World Cup and was also part of her nation’s training camp ahead […]

headline: Lisa Evans goes back to Glasgow City
summary: Lisa Evans returns to Glasgow City for whom the Scotland centurion previously averaged more than a goal a game. She left City to play in the Frauen Bundesliga in 2012, notching up over 80 appearances […]

headline: Hearts Women to clash with Glasgow City in Sky Sports Cup
summary: The draw for the 2024/25 Sky Sports Cup sees Montrose host Celtic in the last sixteen, while Hearts clash with Glasgow City. Joining the Scottish Women’s Premier League were Joelle Murray and Tracy Burns. Murray, […]
